item.title: [pneo] Reckoner Bankbuster
item.description:
Artifact — Vehicle

Reckoner Bankbuster enters the battlefield with three charge counters on it.

{2}, {T}, Remove a charge counter from Reckoner Bankbuster: Draw a card. Then if there are no charge counters on Reckoner Bankbuster, create a Treasure token and a 1/1 colorless Pilot creature token with "This creature crews Vehicles as though its power were 2 greater."

Crew 3

item.title: [p23] Mycosynth Lattice
item.description:
Artifact

All permanents are artifacts in addition to their other types.

All cards that aren't on the battlefield, spells, and permanents are colorless.

Players may spend mana as though it were mana of any color.

item.title: [p23] Painter's Servant
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Scarecrow

As Painter's Servant enters the battlefield, choose a color.

All cards that aren't on the battlefield, spells, and permanents are the chosen color in addition to their other colors.

item.title: [one] Bladed Ambassador
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Soldier

Bladed Ambassador enters the battlefield with an oil counter on it.

{1}, Remove an oil counter from Bladed Ambassador: Bladed Ambassador gains indestructible until end of turn.

item.title: [one] Furnace Punisher
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Warrior

Menace

At the beginning of each player's upkeep, Furnace Punisher deals 2 damage to that player unless they control two or more basic lands.

https://www.ungeek.ph/2023/01/magic-the-gathering-phyrexia-all-will-be-one-card-preview-furnace-punisher/

item.title: [one] Rustvine Cultivator
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Elf Druid

{T}: Put an oil counter on Rustvine Cultivator.

{T}, Remove an oil counter from Rustvine Cultivator: Untap target land.

item.title: [one] Zopandrel, Hunger Dominus
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Phyrexian Horror

Reach

At the beginning of each combat, double the power and toughness of each creature you control until end of turn.

{G/P}{G/P}, Sacrifice two other creatures: Put an indestructible counter on Zopandrel, Hunger Dominus. ({G/P} can be paid with either {G} or 2 life.)

https://twitter.com/Fazendo_Nerdice/status/1618265662660677638/photo/1

item.title: [one] Red Sun's Twilight
item.description:
Sorcery

Destroy up to X target artifacts. If X is 5 or more, for each artifact destroyed this way, create a token that's a copy of it. Those tokens gain haste. Exile them at the beginning of the next end step.

item.title: [one] Dragonwing Glider
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

For Mirrodin! (When this Equipment enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 red Rebel creature token, then attach this to it.)

Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has flying and haste.

Equip {3}{R}{R}

https://magic.wizards.com/en/news/card-image-gallery/phyrexia-all-will-be-one

item.title: [one] The Mycosynth Gardens
item.description:
Land — Sphere

{T}: Add {C}.

{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

{X}, {T}: The Mycosynth Gardens becomes a copy of target nontoken artifact you control with mana value X.

item.title: [one] Tablet of Compleation
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Put an oil counter on Tablet of Compleation.

{T}: Add {C}. Activate only if Tablet of Compleation has two or more oil counters on it.

{1}, {T}: Draw a card. Activate only if Tablet of Compleation has five or more oil counters on it.

https://twitter.com/MTGArenaJP/status/1616367806110486530

item.title: [one] Argentum Masticore
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Phyrexian Masticore

First strike, protection from multicolored

At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Argentum Masticore unless you discard a card. When you discard a card this way, destroy target nonland permanent an opponent controls with mana value less than or equal to the mana value of the discarded card.

item.title: [one] Unctus, Grand Metatect
item.description:
Legendary Artifact Creature — Phyrexian Vedalken

Other blue creatures you control have "Whenever this creature becomes tapped, draw a card, then discard a card."

Other artifact creatures you control get +1/+1.

{U/P}: Until end of turn, target creature you control becomes a blue artifact in addition to its other colors and types. Activate only as a sorcery. ({U/P} can be paid with either {U} or {2} life.)

item.description:

item.title: [one] Thrun, Breaker of Silence
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Troll Shaman

This spell can't be countered.

Trample

Thrun, Breaker of Silence can't be the target of nongreen spells your opponents control or abilities from nongreen sources your opponents control.

As long as it's your turn, Thrun has indestructible.

item.title: [one] Cankerbloom
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Fungus

{1}, Sacrifice Cankerbloom: Choose one —

• Destroy target artifact.

• Destroy target enchantment.

• Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

item.title: [one] Migloz, Maze Crusher
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Phyrexian Beast

Migloz, Maze Crusher enters the battlefield with five oil counters on it.

{1}, Remove an oil counter from Migloz: It gains vigilance and menace until end of turn.

{2}, Remove two oil counters from Migloz: It gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

{3}, Remove three oil counters from Migloz: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

item.title: [one] Solphim, Mayhem Dominus
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Phyrexian Horror

If a source you control would deal noncombat damage to an opponent or a permanent an opponent controls, it deals double that damage to that player or permanent instead.

{1}{R/P}{R/P}, Discard two cards: Put an indestructible counter on Solphim, Mayhem Dominus.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JQE-L36tPmo

item.title: [one] Ria Ivor, Bane of Bladehold
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Phyrexian Knight

Battle cry (Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.)

At the beginning of combat on your turn, the next time target creature would deal combat damage to one or more players this combat, prevent that damage. If damage is prevented this way, create that many 1/1 colorless Phyrexian Mite artifact creature tokens with toxic 1 and "This creature can't block."

item.description:
Instant

Flying

item.title: [one] Charge of the Mites
item.description:
Instant

Choose one—

• Charge of the Mites deals damage equal to the number of creatures you control to target creature or planeswalker.

• Create two 1/1 colorless Phyrexian Mite artifact creature tokens with toxic 1 and "This creature can't block." (Players dealt combat damage by them also get a poison counter.)

item.title: [one] Flensing Raptor
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Bird

Flying

Toxic 1 (Players dealt combat damage by this creature also get a poison counter.)

When Flensing Raptor enters the battlefield, another target creature you control with toxic gets +1/+1 and gains flying until end of turn.

item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature gets +0/+1.

item.title: [one] Indoctrination Attendant
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Cleric

Toxic 1 (Players dealt combat damage by this creature also get a poison counter.)

When Indoctrination Attendant enters the battlefield, you may return another permanent you control to its owner's hand. If you do, create a 1/1 colorless Phyrexian Mite artifact creature token with toxic 1 and "This creature can't block."

item.title: [one] Leonin Lightbringer
item.description:
Creature — Cat Rebel

Ward {2} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)

As long as Leonin Lightbringer is equipped, it gets +1/+1.

item.title: [one] Mandible Justiciar
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Phyrexian Cleric

Lifelink

Whenever another artifact enters the battlefield under your control, Mandible Justiciar gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

item.title: [one] Mirran Bardiche
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

For Mirrodin! (When this Equipment enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 red Rebel creature token, then attach this to it.)

Equipped creature gets +2/+1 and has vigilance.

item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Cleric

Vigilance

item.title: [one] Plated Onslaught
item.description:
Instant

Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.)

Creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn.

item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Flash

Enchant creature

Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.

Corrupted — As long as an opponent has three or more poison counters, enchanted creature gets an additional +1/+0 and has first strike.

item.description:
Instant

Until end of turn, target creature gets +1/+3 and gains flying and toxic 1. (Players dealt combat damage by that creature also get a poison counter.)

item.description:
Artifact Creature — Phyrexian Cat

Flash

When Chrome Prowler enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls.

item.title: [one] Escaped Experiment
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Phyrexian Beast

Whenever Escaped Experiment attacks, target creature an opponent controls gets -X/-0 until end of turn, where X is the number of artifacts you control.

item.title: [one] Eye of Malcator
item.description:
Artifact

When Eye of Malcator enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom and the rest on top in any order.)

Whenever another artifact enters the battlefield under your control, Eye of Malcator becomes a 4/4 Phyrexian Eye artifact creature until end of turn.

item.title: [one] Gitaxian Anatomist
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Wizard

When Gitaxian Anatomist enters the battlefield, you may tap it. If you do, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

item.description:

Flying

item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Advisor

Glistener Seer enters the battlefield with three oil counters on it.

{T}, Remove an oil counter from Glistener Seer: Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.)

item.title: [one] Ichor Synthesizer
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Wizard

Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put an oil counter on Ichor Synthesizer.

As long as Ichor Synthesizer has four or more oil counters on it, it gets +2/+0 and can't be blocked.

item.description:

Flying, vigilance

item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Wizard

When Meldweb Curator enters the battlefield, put up to one target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard on top of your library.

item.title: [one] Meldweb Strider
item.description:
Artifact — Vehicle

Vigilance

Meldweb Strider enters the battlefield with an oil counter on it.

Remove an oil counter from Meldweb Strider: It becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.

Crew 3 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

item.description:
Instant

Each opponent gets a poison counter.

Draw a card.

item.title: [one] Unctus's Retrofitter
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Artificer

Toxic 1 (Players dealt combat damage by this creature also get a poison counter.)

When Unctus's Retrofitter enters the battlefield, up to one target artifact creature you control becomes an artifact creature with base power and toughness 4/4 for as long as Unctus's Retrofitter remains on the battlefield.

Sorcery

As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay {4} or sacrifice an artifact or creature.
